-L.J. Institute of Engineering and Technology, commonly referred as LJIET,is a private technical institute located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. Institute is approved by All India Council for Technical Education and is the part of L.J. Group of Institutes managed by Lok Jagruti Kendra (LJK) Trust.

Address: S.G. Road, Between Sarkhej Circle and Kataria Motors, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 382210.

Founded: 2007

Affiliation: Gujarat Technological University

Undergraduates: 2,500 (approx)

Academic staff: 180
